title: Synchronize contacts and agenda: How to operate if synchronization becomes impossible
answer:
Synchronization of contacts requires logging in to at least one Exchange account.

In the account-setting interface, select Exchange, check the configuration of the mailbox server from the Email service provider's website, and after the configuration is completed, the login is successful.

Enter the home menu, select Settings > Synchronization options > check Synchronize this folder, select the option of Synchronize emails for how many recent days.

If contact synchronization fails, please check the phone's data connection that is turned on and the Mailbox server that supports contact synchronization.
